		<title>Icons</title>
		<link>http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/?page_id=11864</link>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Fortuna ships with more than 1200 icons ready to use in a whole arsenal of different styles and presets. You can also implement icons in the many other elements that the theme includes, such as tabs, top-icon boxes, side-icon boxes, buttons, headings, dividers, custom sliders etc. Take a look at the available icon sets that ship with the theme below, they will suit all your needs and guarantee your website's unique look.[/vc_column_text][boc_spacing height="40px"][vc_column_text]

		<title>Portfolio Grid</title>
		<link>http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/?page_id=20054</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 16 Jan 2015 21:10:49 +0000</pubDate>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/?page_id=20054</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Create custom Filterable Portfolio Grids with the click of a button in Visual Composerwith Fortuna! Fully customize the looks of your grids, add them to any page, add category filters to them etc. Check out some of the modification options below as well as a few examples further down the page.[/vc_column_text][boc_spacing height="20px"][boc_heading html_element="h4" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="20px" background="bgr_double"]Features[/boc_heading][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][boc_list_item icon_size="small" has_icon_color="" icon_color="#333333" icon_solid="" icon="icon icon-check2" margin_bottom="10px"]Display style (<strong>10 Style Presets</strong> availbale)[/boc_list_item][boc_list_item icon_size="small" has_icon_color="" icon_color="#333333" icon_solid="" icon="icon icon-check2" margin_bottom="10px"]Image Hover Effect (<strong>4 Style Presets</strong> available)[/boc_list_item][boc_list_item icon_size="small" has_icon_color="" icon_color="#333333" icon_solid="" icon="icon icon-check2" margin_bottom="10px"]Item Spacing (<strong>3 Options</strong> available)[/boc_list_item][boc_list_item icon_size="small" has_icon_color="" icon_color="#333333" icon_solid="" icon="icon icon-check2" margin_bottom="10px"]Column Count[/boc_list_item][boc_list_item icon_size="small" has_icon_color="" icon_color="#333333" icon_solid="" icon="icon icon-check2" margin_bottom="10px"]Total Items inGrid[/boc_list_item][boc_list_item icon_size="small" has_icon_color="" icon_color="#333333" icon_solid="" icon="icon 		<title>Dividers</title>
		<link>http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/?page_id=21518</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 18 Mar 2015 16:31:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/?page_id=21518</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][boc_heading html_element="h3" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="20px"]Plain <strong>Divider</strong>[/boc_heading][boc_divider divider_position="left" divider_height="1px" divider_color="#eeeeee" margin_top="20px" margin_bottom="20px" icon_position="center" icon_color="#bbbbbb" icon_bg="#ffffff" icon_bg_border="#ffffff" icon_size="14px" icon_padding="10px"][vc_column_text]Fortuna's divider element is a very powerful tool that can be customized in various ways with just a few clicks. You can modify its width, height, color, margins, add custom animations to it, add an icon to it, modify the icon color, background, size, border, position etc. Combined with the more than <a title="Icons" href="http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/?page_id=11864"><strong>1200 Icons</strong></a> that Fortuna ships with along with the custom sizes and colors you have you vurtually haveunlimited number ofcustomizion options for your Dividers. Here are some examples below:[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][boc_divider divider_position="left" divider_height="2px" divider_color="#1bc6ad" margin_top="20px" margin_bottom="20px" icon_position="center" icon_color="#bbbbbb" icon_bg="#ffffff" icon_bg_border="#ffffff" icon_size="14px" icon_padding="10px"][boc_heading html_element="h4" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" margin_top="50px" margin_bottom="10px"]Custom Height, Width &amp; 	<item>
		<title>Accordions</title>
		<link>http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/?page_id=21565</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 20 Mar 2015 15:55:09 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/?page_id=21565</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Fortuna features a highly customizable Accordion Element that is very easy to manage. You can set the plus/minus Icon style, add borders between the items, pick from a few different Accordion style presets - Regular and Background. You can also set an item that you want opened by default and it will animate to an open state once the user scrolls to it. Here's what you can manage with Fortuna's accordions:[/vc_column_text][boc_list_item icon_size="small" margin_bottom="10px" icon="icon icon-check2"]Icon Style (circular or squared)[/boc_list_item][boc_list_item icon_size="small" margin_bottom="10px" icon="icon icon-check2"]Background Style[/boc_list_item][boc_list_item icon_size="small" margin_bottom="10px" icon="icon icon-check2"]Border Style[/boc_list_item][boc_list_item icon_size="small" margin_bottom="10px" icon="icon icon-check2"]Accordion item active toggle[/boc_list_item][boc_spacing height="60px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][boc_heading html_element="h3" color="#333333" background="bgr_multidotted" margin_bottom="50px" css_classes="no_text_transform"]Square Button <strong>Accordion</strong>[/boc_heading][boc_accordion_section][boc_accordion title="Stunning Design &amp; Countless Options" is_open="yes"]<img class="alignleft size-medium wp-image-21572" style="max-width: 240px; margin: 4px 24px 10px 0;" src="http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/hand_phone-300x200.jpg" alt="Some phone" />Fortuna is a diverse Wordpress themesuitable for a wide variety of websites: Corporate, Company, eCommerce, Portfolio, Personal, Blogs.Start our trial today![boc_spacing height="16px"]
<ul class="theme_color_ul">
	<li>Fully customized Visual Composer</li>
	<li>Tons of customizable Elements to use</li>
	<li>Easy to import Demos</li>
</ul>
[/boc_accordion][boc_accordion title="Tons of customization options at your finger tips"]Fortuna will blow your mind with the virtuallyunlimited customization options it offers. Hundreds of style presets are available to you for all your menus, portfolio items, post items, carousels, grids etc.Fortuna is a responsive, clean design wordpress theme that features plenty of custom shortcode elements that with the help of Visual Composer make content creation and editing easy and fun.[boc_spacing height="16px"]
<ul class="theme_color_ul">
	<li>Fully customized Visual Composer</li>
	<li>Tons of customizable Elements to use</li>
	<li>Easy to import Demos</li>
</ul>
[/boc_accordion][boc_accordion title="Ease of Content creation and modification"]Fortunaships with plenty of customizable interface elements ready to add to your page at the click of a button via the best Drag'n'Drop plugin - Visual Composer.Fortuna features a large set of custom menu presets you can choose from for your main navigation that you can further customize by choosing custom colors, add icons, add menu buttons, add hover effects to menu items etc.[/boc_accordion][/boc_accordion_section][boc_spacing height="60px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][boc_heading html_element="h3" color="#333333" background="bgr_multidotted" margin_bottom="50px" css_classes="no_text_transform"]Round Button, Bordered <strong>Accordion</strong>[/boc_heading][boc_accordion_section rounded="yes" border="yes"][boc_accordion title="Stunning Design &amp; Countless Options"]<img class="alignleft size-medium wp-image-21572" style="max-width: 240px; margin: 4px 24px 10px 0;" src="http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/hand_phone-300x200.jpg" alt="Some phone" />Fortuna is a diverse Wordpress themesuitable for a wide variety of websites: Corporate, Company, eCommerce, Portfolio, Personal, Blogs.Start our trial today![boc_spacing height="16px"]

	<item>
		<title>Icon Element</title>
		<link>http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/?page_id=21625</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 23 Mar 2015 09:31:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/?page_id=21625</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Fortuna features anIconElement Shortcode that is very easy to customize via the Visual Composer modal created specifically for it. You can set the Icon size, color, background, border,position, margin, CSS animation. Use the Icon element separately or combine it with a heading to make one pop out more.You can choose from the list of more than [tooltip title="Check out the full icon list"]<a title="Icons" href="http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/?page_id=11864"><strong>1200 icons</strong></a>[/tooltip]that ship with the theme in order to communicate your message visually to your clients.[/vc_column_text][boc_list_item icon_size="small" margin_bottom="10px" icon="icon icon-check2"]IconSize[/boc_list_item][boc_list_item icon_size="small" margin_bottom="10px" icon="icon icon-check2"]IconPosition[/boc_list_item][boc_list_item icon_size="small" margin_bottom="10px" icon="icon icon-check2"]IconColor[/boc_list_item][boc_list_item icon_size="small" margin_bottom="10px" icon="icon icon-check2"]Icon Background[/boc_list_item][boc_list_item icon_size="small" margin_bottom="10px" icon="icon icon-check2"]Icon Background[/boc_list_item][boc_list_item icon_size="small" margin_bottom="10px" icon="icon icon-check2"]IconBorder[/boc_list_item][boc_spacing height="60px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/6"][boc_icon size="large" icon_position="center" icon_color="#08ada7" icon="icon icon-world"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][boc_icon icon_position="center" icon_color="#ffffff" has_icon_bg="yes" icon_bg="#ed1785" icon_bg_border="rgba(10,10,10,0.15)" icon="icon icon-heart2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][boc_icon icon_position="center" icon_color="#08ada7" has_icon_bg="yes" icon_bg="#f8f8f8" icon_bg_border="#ededed" icon="icon icon-plugin"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][boc_icon icon_position="center" icon_color="#ffffff" has_icon_bg="yes" icon_bg="#219cd1" icon="icon 		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Among the many carousels Fortuna features there's the portfolio carousel element thatis fully responsive and is draggable. It hasplenty ofcustomization options , still it is very easy to manage. You can set the portfolio item style (10 Presets to choose from), the hover image effect (4 Presets to choose from), Arrow navigation position, additional dot navigation management, how many items are in the viewport, scroll speed, custom query for the items etc. Combine the different options and you get a virtually unlimited possible portfolio carousel appearance setups. <strong>Navigation</strong> Possibilities[/boc_heading][boc_divider divider_width="100px" divider_height="2px" divider_color="#eeeeee" margin_bottom="30px"][vc_column_text]<img class="alignleft size-medium wp-image-21460" style="margin: 10px 50px 16px 0;" src="http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/imac-300x265.png" alt="" width="300" height="265" />Fortuna wordpress themefeatures a highly customized version of Visual Composer - one of the best visual builder plugins out there. It helps you create highly customizable, sophisticated page elements with just the click of a few buttons. You can create custom templates holding sets of elements that you can further reuse on your pages.

The best of the best is combined in Fortuna, fine aesthetics, strong functional backbone, plenty of customizable elements, a vast array of theme customization options and last but not least a 5 star support.

Fortuna features a large set of custom menu presets you can choose from for your main navigation that you can further customize by choosing custom colors, add icons, add menu buttons, add hover effects to menu items etc.Fortuna comes with a vast variety of customizable Theme Options. Additional features include a Transparent header menu navigation, custom Mega Menus, more than 1200 icons to choose from for your menu items.[/vc_column_text][/boc_tab][boc_tab title="Customizable Menus" icon="icon icon-bars"][boc_heading color="#333333"]Diverse <strong>Navigation</strong> Possibilities[/boc_heading][boc_divider divider_width="100px" divider_height="2px" divider_color="#eeeeee"][vc_column_text]Fortuna features a large set of custom menu presets you can choose from for your main navigation that you can further customize by choosing custom colors, add icons, add menu buttons, add hover effects to menu items etc.

It helps you create highly customizable, sophisticated page elements with just the click of a few buttons. You can create custom templates holding sets of elements that you can further reuse on your pages.

The best of the best is combined in Fortuna, fine aesthetics, strong functional backbone, plenty of customizable elements, a vast array of theme customization options and last but not least a 5 star support.

Fortuna features a large set of custom menu presets you can choose from for your main navigation that you can further customize by choosing custom colors, add icons, add menu buttons, add hover effects to menu items etc.Fortuna comes with a vast variety of customizable Theme Options. Additional features include a Transparent header menu navigation, custom Mega Menus, more than 1200 icons to choose from for your menu items.[/vc_column_text][/boc_tab][boc_tab title="Customizable Menus" icon="icon icon-bars"][boc_heading color="#333333"]Diverse <strong>Navigation</strong> Possibilities[/boc_heading][boc_divider divider_width="100px" divider_height="2px" divider_color="#eeeeee"][vc_column_text]Fortuna features a large set of custom menu presets you can choose from for your main navigation that you can further customize by choosing custom colors, add icons, add menu buttons, add hover effects to menu items etc.

Carousel any post type with it, pick from various item style presets (differentbox styles, date styles, customize what elemends to display), pick custom hover image effects (4 Presets to choose from), Arrow navigation position, additional dot navigation management, how many items are in the viewport, scroll speed, custom query for the items etc. Combine the different options and you get a virtually unlimited possible Post Carousel appearance setups. 	<item>
		<title>Text Box</title>
		<link>http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/?page_id=22508</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 05 May 2015 13:59:46 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/?page_id=22508</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Fortuna features a Text Box element-call to action box that you can use to stress on a piece of text and add a button. Pick from severalstyle presets (Boxed/Bordered/Normal) in order to create different outputs. Check out some of the most useful elementoptions below as well as a fewexamples further below them.[/vc_column_text][boc_spacing height="20px"][boc_heading html_element="h4" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="20px" background="bgr_single"]Features[/boc_heading][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][boc_list_item icon_size="small" has_icon_color="" icon_color="#333333" icon_solid="" icon="icon icon-check2"]Text Title[/boc_list_item][boc_list_item icon_size="small" has_icon_color="" icon_color="#333333" icon_solid="" icon="icon icon-check2"]TextContent[/boc_list_item][boc_list_item icon_size="small" has_icon_color="" icon_color="#333333" icon_solid="" icon="icon icon-check2"]Background Toggle[/boc_list_item][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][boc_list_item icon_size="small" has_icon_color="" icon_color="#333333" icon_solid="" icon="icon icon-check2"]Accent Color Border Toggle[/boc_list_item][boc_list_item icon_size="small" has_icon_color="" icon_color="#333333" icon_solid="" icon="icon icon-check2"]Button Link[/boc_list_item][boc_list_item icon_size="small" has_icon_color="" icon_color="#333333" icon_solid="" icon="icon icon-check2"]CSS Animation[/boc_list_item][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][boc_spacing height="60px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row Certain elements like Top icon Boxes, Side Icon Boxes, Bar Graphs, Counters, Circular Counters etc. have custom animations that you can switch on. Additionally you can animate texts with a Typewriter Effect or Rotate specific bits of a string. 	<item>
		<title>Text Message</title>
		<link>http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/?page_id=22555</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 13 May 2015 08:59:27 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/?page_id=22555</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Fortuna features custom Text Message element that you can add to your page texts. Simply add a new text element and from the Shortcode drop-down select "Message". All you need to do left is leave out the type of message you want under the "type" attribute, possible values are:<strong>information</strong>, <strong>success</strong>, <strong>attention</strong>, <strong>warning_msg</strong>.[/vc_column_text][boc_spacing height="20px"][boc_heading html_element="h4" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="20px" background="bgr_double"]Message Examples[/boc_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text][boc_message type="success"]Success message text example[/boc_message][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text][boc_message type="information"]Informationmessage text example[/boc_message][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text][boc_message type="attention"]Attentionmessage text example[/boc_message][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text][boc_message type="warning_msg"]Warningmessage text example[/boc_message][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]]]></content:encoded>

dropVisualBuilder (<strong>$33 worth</strong>). Fortuna also provides you a free copy of the Parallax &amp; Video Backgrounds for Visual Composer plugin (<strong>$10 Value</strong>). Create custom layouts made up of rows and columns and add your elements to them, setup custom section parallax, gradient or video backgrounds, add stunning parallax effects to your content, cool section borders, custom colors, setup element design presets or custom queries with no coding skills required, only using the visual drag'n drop interface.[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="22811" border_color="grey" img_link_large="yes" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full"][/boc_tab][boc_tab title="Premium Sliders" icon="icon icon-image"][boc_heading html_element="h2" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" background="bgr_multidotted" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="20px"]Premium Sliders[/boc_heading][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_column_text]Fortuna Ships with a FREE license of the amazing [tooltip title="Visit Plugin's Page"]<strong>Revolutions Slider</strong>[/tooltip] plugin (<strong>$18 Value</strong>) which lets you create stunning animated sliders with its full featured drag'n drop backend that is very easy to use.[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="22810" border_color="grey" img_link_large="yes" img_link_target="_self" img_size="large" el_class="grey_border_img"][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_column_text]Fortuna alsoutilizes fully Responsive, draggable Image sliders and carousels that you can easily use via the Visual composer interface in order to create stunning looking Image sliders, post carousels, portfolio carousels, logo carousels and testimonial carousels.[/vc_column_text][/boc_tab][boc_tab title="Theme Options" icon="icon icon-cog"][boc_heading html_element="h2" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" background="bgr_multidotted" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="20px"]Rich Theme Options[/boc_heading][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_column_text]Fortunacomes with a vast variety of customizable Theme Options that help you setup websites with unique look &amp; feel. You can setup mostof them globally for your website in the Theme Options panel then you canmodify some of them on a per page basis under your page editor. An extended version of the Wordpress Customize screen is also available where you can preview some of the global settingsLive on your website as you make the changes. Heres a list of the globalTheme Options offered in Fortuna:[/vc_column_text][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_single_image image="22814" border_color="grey" img_link_large="yes" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="grey_border_img"][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_row_inner el_id=""][vc_column_inner el_class="" width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
<ul>
	<li>Logo</li>
	<li>Retina Logo</li>
	<li>Favicon</li>

	<li>Transparent Logo Transition Effect</li>
	<li>Transparent Header Background Color</li>
	<li>Transparent Header Opacity</li>
	<li>Transparent Header Navigation Text Color</li>
	<li>Transparent Header Navigation Hover Color</li>
	<li>Enable breadcrumbs</li>
	<li>Breadcrumb Position Toggle</li>

	<li>Unfolding Footer Feature Toggle</li>
	<li>Copyrights Text in Footer</li>
	<li>Footer Social Icons</li>
</ul>
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="" width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

	<li>Main Navigation Font</li>
	<li>Main Sub-Navigation Font</li>

	<li>Body Font</li>

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][boc_spacing height="40px"][boc_heading html_element="h3" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" background="bgr_multidotted" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="20px"]Page-specific options[/boc_heading][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_column_text]Apart from the Global Theme Options that Fortuna offers you can further customize your pages by using the "Fortuna Page Settings" once you are in the Page editing screen. You can thus overwrite global settings like selecting a specific sidebar, a different page background image or activating the Transparent Main Navigation only for a particular page. Here's a list of the available Page Setting options:

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="" width="1/1"][vc_column_text]
<ul>
	<li>Page Wrapper Style (Boxed or Full)</li>
	<li>Show Page Heading (Area with Page Title &amp; Breadcrumbs)</li>
	<li>Page Content Top Margin Toggle</li>
	<li>Activate Transparent Header</li>
	<li>Set Explicit Page Background</li>
	<li>Select Sidebar Layout(Left/Right/None)</li>
	<li>Pick a sidebar if Layout has one</li>
</ul>
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][boc_spacing height="40px"][boc_heading html_element="h3" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" background="bgr_multidotted" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="20px"]Extended Customize Screen[/boc_heading][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_column_text]Fortuna offers an extended Customize Screen functionality where you can preview LIVE some of the changes you apply to your Global Theme Settings.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_id=""][vc_column_inner el_class="" width="1/1"][vc_column_text]
<ul>
	<li>Main Theme Color(<strong>Unlimited</strong>)</li>
	<li>Main Menu Style (<strong>6 Presets</strong> Available)</li>
	<li>Main Menu Accent Color(<strong>Unlimited</strong>)</li>
</ul>
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/boc_tab][boc_tab title="Custom Headers" icon="icon icon-screen"][boc_heading html_element="h2" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" background="bgr_multidotted" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="20px"]Custom Headers, Menus, Page Headings &amp; Footers[/boc_heading][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_column_text]Fortuna provides full control of your header &amp; footer style. You can modify your <strong>header height</strong>, <strong>background color</strong>, <strong>transparency</strong>, <strong>menu color</strong>, <strong>hover menu color</strong>, pick <strong>custom fonts</strong> for your main navigation &amp; subnavigation, pick from <strong>6 different menu style presets</strong>, add an <strong>underline hover animation effect</strong> for your top level navigation items, add an <strong>animated arrow hover effect</strong> for your subnavigation items, setup transparent headers on a per page basis, set the <strong>transparency level</strong> of your transparent header as well as its <strong>background color</strong>, toggle your <strong>Sticky Header</strong> option, you can create <strong>Mega Menus</strong>, add <strong>buttons</strong> to your main navigations and many more. You can also pick your <strong>footer style</strong> as well as select how many <strong>widget columns</strong> you want in it. Menu headings (the area that contains your breadcrumbs and Page title) can also be modifiedon a per page basis - you can pick <strong>custom backgrounds</strong> for it, switch off the <strong>breadcrumbs</strong>, pick <strong>breadcrumb style</strong> etc. See just a few examples of customized headers (footer) below.[/vc_column_text][boc_spacing height="40px"][boc_img_gallery columns="2" spacing="big_spacing" fixed_size="" img_link="lightbox" show_hover_overlay="yes" show_img_title="" show_img_alt="" image_ids="22818,22820,22821,22822,22823,22819,22816,22817"][/boc_tab][boc_tab title="Unlimited Colors" icon="icon icon-eyedropper2"][boc_heading html_element="h2" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" background="bgr_multidotted" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="20px"]Unlimited Colors for all Page Elements[/boc_heading][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_column_text]Fortuna supports full color management. You can set a global Theme color that all your elements will inherit, you can then overwrite that color for specific page elements in order to style them differently. Most Fortuna elements allow color customizations: buttons, icons, icon boxes, bar graphs, counters, messages, lists etc. You also have full color control of your Header - manage your header background color/transparency, your navigation items color as well as their hover status color.[/vc_column_text][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_single_image image="22830" border_color="grey" img_link_large="yes" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="grey_border_img"][/boc_tab][boc_tab title="Google Fonts" icon="icon icon-font"][boc_heading html_element="h2" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" background="bgr_multidotted" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="20px"]Pick custom fonts for your Menus, Buttons, Headers &amp; Body[/boc_heading][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_column_text]Fortuna lets you have full control over your website fonts. Add any Google font then assign it to your Menus, Headings, Buttons, Body etc. You can also set the font-size, font-width, letter-spacing, font-weight etc for all your fonts globally.[/vc_column_text][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_single_image image="22831" border_color="grey" img_link_large="yes" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="grey_border_img"][/boc_tab][boc_tab title="Icon Sets" icon="icon icon-thumbs-up"][boc_heading html_element="h2" alignment="left" css_animation="" color="#333333" subheading="" background="bgr_multidotted" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="20px"]More than 1200 icons or 4 Premium Icon Sets[/boc_heading][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_column_text]Fortuna ships with <strong>4 Premium Icon Fonts</strong> that you can implement withing your page elements with the click of a button. Choose among more than <strong>1200 hot icons</strong> to add to your pages or implement within your Main Navigation, Icon boxes, Dividers, Buttons, Tab Navigations, Counters, Custom Slider Navigations etc. You can pick custom colors, styles, sizes for your icons as well in order to unleash your creativity and create unique content.[/vc_column_text][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_single_image image="22834" border_color="grey" img_link_large="yes" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full"][/boc_tab][boc_tab title="Unlimited Sidebars" icon="icon icon-text2"][boc_heading html_element="h2" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" background="bgr_multidotted" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="20px"]Unlimited Sidebars[/boc_heading][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_column_text]Fortuna lets you define an unlimited number of custom sidebars you can later assign to your pages. Add custom widgets to your sidebars like menus, Fortuna Latest News widget, Fortuna Contact widget, categories etc, pick a global sidebar position for your website and overwrite it voluntarily within each page.[/vc_column_text][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_single_image image="22835" border_color="grey" img_link_large="yes" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="grey_border_img"][/boc_tab][boc_tab title="Demo Data" icon="icon icon-disk2"][boc_heading html_element="h2" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" background="bgr_multidotted" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="20px"]Easy to import Demo Data[/boc_heading][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_column_text]Fortuna comes with FullDemo Data ready to import straight onto your Wordpress installation. All Revolution Slider Demos (Sliders) are also included so you can use them as a base for your own sliders.[/vc_column_text][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_single_image image="22837" border_color="grey" img_link_large="yes" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="grey_border_img"][/boc_tab][boc_tab title="Woocommerce Ready" icon="icon icon-shopping-cart"][boc_heading html_element="h2" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" background="bgr_multidotted" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="20px"]Full Woocommerce Support, start selling with Fortuna today![/boc_heading][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_column_text]Create aWooCommerceonline store in a matter of minutes &amp; start selling with Fortuna today! The theme also includes a few custom Modules for WooCommerce, custom sidebars for your store and product pages, a capability for adding a slider above your store, animated Ajax Cart in your website header etc.[/vc_column_text][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_single_image image="22839" border_color="grey" img_link_large="yes" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="grey_border_img"][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_single_image image="22823" border_color="grey" img_link_large="yes" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="grey_border_img"][/boc_tab][boc_tab title="Support &amp; Updates" icon="icon icon-lifebuoy"][boc_heading html_element="h2" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" background="bgr_multidotted" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="20px"]Fortuna ships with a 5-Star Support + Lifetime FREE updates[/boc_heading][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_column_text]Should you have any question or issue with Fortuna you can post it in our support forum and we will assist you shortly in a friendly and timely matter! Unlimited updates are also included with your ThemeForest purchase.[/vc_column_text][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_single_image image="22841" border_color="grey" img_link_large="yes" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="grey_border_img"][/boc_tab][boc_tab title="Translation Ready" icon="icon icon-chat2"][boc_heading html_element="h2" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" background="bgr_multidotted" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="20px"]Translation Ready[/boc_heading][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_column_text]FortunaWorpress Theme follows good-coding practices with translation in mind and comes with Po/Mo files for English, that are ready for Internationalization and Translation.
It is also fully compatible with WPML plugin as well as qTranslate in case you wish to have a multi-language website.[/vc_column_text][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_single_image image="22842" border_color="grey" img_link_large="yes" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="grey_border_img"][/boc_tab][boc_tab title="SEO Optimized" icon="icon icon-search3"][boc_heading html_element="h2" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" background="bgr_multidotted" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="20px"]SEO Optimized[/boc_heading][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_column_text]Fortuna is written with SEO in mind!Headings, breadcrumbs, navigation, meta tags etc. and the way they appear in the code were taken under consideration when Fortunatemplates were coded.
Furthermore Fortuna is fully compatible with SEO Yoast plugin and recommends its use for a complete SEO solution on your website.[/vc_column_text][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_single_image image="22843" border_color="grey" img_link_large="yes" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="grey_border_img"][/boc_tab][boc_tab title="Fully Documented" icon="icon icon-bookmark"][boc_heading html_element="h2" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" background="bgr_multidotted" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="20px"]Fortuna is Fully Documented[/boc_heading][boc_spacing height="20px"][vc_column_text]Fortuna's thorough Documentationtakes your through the whole process of installing your theme, importing the Demo, creating pages, using the various elementsand plugins, customizing the theme etc.[/vc_column_text][/boc_tab][/boc_tabs][boc_spacing height="40px"][/vc_column][/vc_row]]]></content:encoded>

It features fine aesthetics, strong functional backend, plenty of customizable elements, a vast array of theme customization options and last but not least a 5 star support.Fortuna is extremely diverse andimplements Visual Composer.</span></p>

style="margin: 10px 50px 16px 0;" src="http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/imac-300x265.png" alt="" width="300" height="265" />Fortuna wordpress themefeatures a highly customized version of Visual Composer - one of the best visual builder plugins out there. It helps you create highly customizable, sophisticated page elements with just the click of a few buttons. You can create custom templates holding sets of elements that you can further reuse on your pages.

The best of the best is combined in Fortuna, fine aesthetics, strong functional backbone, plenty of customizable elements, a vast array of theme customization options and last but not least a 5 star support.

Fortuna features a large set of custom menu presets you can choose from for your main navigation that you can further customize by choosing custom colors, add icons, add menu buttons, add hover effects to menu items etc.Fortuna comes with a vast variety of customizable Theme Options. Additional features include a Transparent header menu navigation, custom Mega Menus, more than 1200 icons to choose from for your menu items.[/vc_column_text][/boc_tab][boc_tab title="Customizable Menus" icon="icon icon-bars"][boc_heading color="#333333"]Diverse <strong>Navigation</strong> Possibilities[/boc_heading][boc_divider divider_width="100px" divider_height="2px" divider_color="#eeeeee"][vc_column_text]Fortuna features a large set of custom menu presets you can choose from for your main navigation that you can further customize by choosing custom colors, add icons, add menu buttons, add hover effects to menu items etc.

<p style="text-align: right;">Fortuna is a responsive, clean design wordpress theme that features plenty ofcool features</p>

@import url(http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Oswald:400,700,300);

@media only screen and (min-width: 1018px){
    #header.transparent_header:not(.scrolled) {
	background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05);
	box-shadow: 0 0 3px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0 0 3px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);       
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 3px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);   
	}    
	#header.transparent_header:not(.scrolled) #menu > ul > li:hover > a, 
	#header.transparent_header:not(.scrolled) .header_cart a.icon:hover, 
	#header.transparent_header:not(.scrolled) #subheader a:hover {       
	    color: #F94067;    
	}
}
.custom_menu_4 #menu > ul > li ul > li > a:hover {    
    background-color: #C72245;
}
#menu > ul > li > div, .subsub_menu {    
    border-top: 2px solid #C72245;
}
.main_menu_underline_effect #menu > ul > li > a:after {    
    background-color: #C72245;
}
#menu > ul > li ul > li > a {    
    padding: 7px 13px 7px 15px;   
    min-width: 192px;
}

		<title>Fortuna Blog Item</title>
		<link>http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/?p=22114</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 17 Apr 2015 11:35:35 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blueowlcreative.com/wp/fortuna_export/?p=22114</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Proin molestie sollicitudin purus, vel molestie ante tristique ut. Cras porta justo nec est ultricies ultricies. Aliquam molestie, erat non laoreet sagittis, felis sapien convallis tellus, lacinia faucibus velit dolor nec lorem. Vestibulum semper auctor dictum. Cras id risus ut urna congue fermentum.[boc_heading html_element="h3" alignment="left" color="#333333" subheading="" margin_top="30px" margin_bottom="20px"]Fortuna <strong>Heading</strong> Text[/boc_heading]Aliquam molestie, erat non laoreet sagittis, felis sapien convallis tellus, lacinia faucibus velit dolor nec lorem. Vestibulum semper auctor dictum. Cras id risus ut urna congue fermentum. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae; Nam ut sapien nisi. Pellentesque non dui libero, sit amet lacinia libero. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae; Aliquam non convallis odio. Proin ut semper nulla. Aliquam tincidunt luctus metus sed facilisis.[boc_spacing height="20px"]
